name: IsArtinianRing.instDecompositionMonoid
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : IsArtinianRing R
inst✝ : IsReduced R
⊢ DecompositionMonoid R

name: IsArtinianRing.instDecompositionMonoidPolynomial
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : IsArtinianRing R
inst✝ : IsReduced R
⊢ DecompositionMonoid (Polynomial R)
decl:
instance : DecompositionMonoid (Polynomial R) :=
  MulEquiv.decompositionMonoid <| (Polynomial.mapEquiv <| equivPi R).trans (Polynomial.piEquiv _)

name: IsArtinianRing.isSemisimpleRing_of_isReduced
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : IsArtinianRing R
inst✝ : IsReduced R
⊢ IsSemisimpleRing R
